message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Identity + status report (not translator)">
Everyone EXCEPT translator-2: Reply to team-lead with:
1. Your role/identity
2. What files you have loaded (report name + essays)
3. What happened since your last identity report to team-lead

Brief answers only. Reply to team-lead, not to each other.
</teammate-message>

input.content: This message was addressed to "everyone EXCEPT translator-2." I am translator-2, so this does not apply to me. No action taken.
input.summary: Message not for me, no action taken

routing.summary: Message not for me, no action taken
routing.content: This message was addressed to "everyone EXCEPT translator-2." I am translator-2, so this does not apply to me. No action taken.

content.text: The broadcast was addressed to everyone except translator-2. Since I am translator-2, I acknowledged to team-lead that it does not apply to me. Continuing to wait for instructions.
